title: Rickshaw Settings Schema
description: This schema defines the rickshaw-settings configuration file

endpoints.description: The endpoints object contains configuration settings used by the endpoints and to control how they are invoked

default.description: This object contains default values for various settings that are used by the endpoints

user.description: This parameter controls the default username that is used to connect to an endpoint

log-level.description: This parameter controls what logging level the endpoints are invoked with.  This only applies to the Python endpoints

roadblock.description: The roadblock object contains configuration settings specific to how roadblocker.py is invoked

connection-watchdog.description: This parameter controls whether roadblock should have the connection watchdog enabled

log-level.description: This parameter controls what logging level roadblocker.py should be invoked with

timeouts.description: This object contains default timeout values for various types of roadblocks that Rickshaw uses

collect-sysinfo.description: This parameter defines the default timeout for the sysinfo collection roadblock

default.description: This parameter defines the default timeout that applies to all roadblocks that do not have a specific default timeout defined

endpoint-deploy.description: This parameter defines the default timeout that is used for the endpoint deployment phase where the endpoints launch the engines

engine-start.description: This parameter defines the default timeout that is used to wait for the engines to come online after they are deployed.

userenvs.description: The userenv object contains configuration settings about the userenvs

default.decsription: This object contains the default userenv definition for different engine types

benchmarks.descrition: This parameter defines the default userenv for the client/server engines

tools.description: This parameter defines the default userenv for the profiler engines

workshop.description: The workshop object contains configuration settings that control how rickshaw-run uses workshop

force-builds.description: This paramter controls whether or not rickshaw-run is forced to build container images even if they already exist during a run
